content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for your interest in the apartment. The rental price is negotiable, but I am sure we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. What is your budget for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. I am dependable and responsible, so I think I could be a good tenant for you. Please let me know the rental price you have in mind.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Ryanah. Based on the size of the apartment and the location, I would expect a rental price in the range of 500-700 Euros per month. However, I am open to discussing a lower price if you can prove your reliability and responsibility as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month, as long as I can make the payments on time and maintain the apartment in good condition.

Please let me know if there are any additional costs or fees that I should be aware of.

Thank you again for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Ryanah Rahman
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you, Ryanah, for agreeing to the rental price of 700 Euros per month. I appreciate your commitment to paying on time and maintaining the apartment in good condition.

There are no additional costs or fees associated with the rental of this apartment. However, please be aware that utilities such as electricity, water, and gas are not included in the rental price and will need to be paid separately by the tenant.

I am glad to have you as a tenant and look forward to our business relationship. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
